parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joints can cause loss of steering ability, leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: front end of the vehicle jumping sideways
upper and lower ball joints snapping

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower control arm can cause loss of steering ability, leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Vehicle experienced the same defect as stated in recall 96V018001
but the vehicle was not included due to VIN
driver-side lower control arm ball joint stud and nut were separated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the coil spring can cause noise and affect vehicle stability, leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Front coil spring broke causing noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Suspension problems can cause premature tire wear, affect vehicle stability, and lead to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Suspension problem causing premature tire wear
vehicle has been aligned but was denied approval due to bad alignment
unusual wear and tear on tires.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Insufficient lubrication of the differential unit can cause the vehicle to fishtail, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: rear end swinging back and forth

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling in reverse can cause accidents, especially when the vehicle is in motion, and can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Engine stalls when put in reverse

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission and axle issues can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: broken bolts in the torque converter

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The "skip shift" feature in the 6-speed manual transmission can be distracting to the driver, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: Distraction from the driver due to the "skip shift" feature.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Auto-transmission issues can cause accidents, especially when the vehicle fails to respond in reverse, and can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle will not respond in reverse
locks down with warning from the console.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The ability of a child to shift gears into neutral can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Child able to shift gears into neutral

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty serpentine belt can cause engine overheating, leading to engine damage, stalling, and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Chirping or squealing noise from the serpentine belt

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A malfunctioning air pump can cause the check engine light to illuminate, leading to decreased engine performance and potentially causing emissions issues.
A leaking oil cooler line can cause engine damage, overheating, and potentially lead to engine failure.
Engine stalling can cause accidents, especially when reversing, and can lead to engine damage.
A broken flywheel and torque converter can cause engine damage, stalling, and potentially lead to accidents.
A failed muffler can cause decreased engine performance, noise pollution, and potentially lead to engine damage.
